thread.title: MobileIron Expands Educational Resources with New Authorized Training Partner Program

title: MobileIron Expands Educational Resources with New Authorized Training Partner Program
text: MobileIron Expands Educational Resources with New Authorized Training Partner Program » Science & Technology Published on 2015-10-08 05:30:55 MobileIron Expands Educational Resources with New Authorized Training Partner Program -- MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., Oct. 8,   MobileIron's Logo. MobileIron's Logo.  ><- stripped tags -> MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. , Oct. 8,   MobileIron (NASDAQ: [[]]), the leader in mobile enterprise security, today launched the [[]]. Until now, MobileIron training was delivered primarily through MobileIron University, MobileIron's online training and accreditation portal. With the Authorized Training Partner Program, MobileIron partners are enabled to deliver product training to customers through live classes and hands-on labs in their native languages. Instructors are trained on the most advanced MobileIron solutions and have passed audits for location, content, and training ability. "Education helps enterprises realize the transformative benefits of mobile apps and devices while protecting sensitive corporate information," said Mike McCarron , Vice President of Customer Success, MobileIron. "The Authorized Training Partner Program brings live MobileIron training closer to our customers and helps our partners become trusted mobile advisors." "Together with MobileIron, we are bringing in-depth mobile security training to our customers in the format that is most convenient for them," said Peter Coddington , CEO, PaRaBaL. "Educated customers use mobility to increase business efficiency and employee productivity, all while getting a greater return out of their investment in MobileIron." Today, the MobileIron Authorized Training Partner Program includes the following reseller partners: Exclusive Networks – United Kingdom
